name: Glitchy Controls
description:
Made for the GMTK game jam 2021.

You're controlling a robot whose the controls are glitching out. Guide it through the underground factory while avoiding enemy robots before it's too late.

All code, art and music by me.

PROTIP: Enemies can't see you when you're crouching!

Didn't really have time to clean up the page. Sorry... Also, WebGL doesn't seem to work for some reason.
